# DECORATOR::DECOR_EXIST_ON

## Summary
Query to see if an object has the decorator applied to it

## Parameters
* **ITEM_INDEX** guid: Object to remove decorators from
* **STRING** decoratorName: Name of the decorator

## Returns
* **BOOL**: BOOL true if exists else false

## Description
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Returns whether or not the specified property is set for the entity.
